keyMoments.description: Wapol fuses two crew members (Chess and Kuromarimo) into Chessmarimo using his Devil Fruit powers
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the extreme measures Wapol will take with his subordinates, treating them as disposable resources

keyMoments.description: Chessmarimo is defeated by Chopper, separating back into Chess and Kuromarimo
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's declining power as they lose to the Straw Hats and their allies

name: Straw Hat Pirates

keyMoments.description: Luffy plants Dr. Hiriluk's flag atop Drum Castle, showing respect for the late doctor's dreams
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's understanding of inherited will and their commitment to helping Drum Island

keyMoments.description: Zoro and Usopp assist in transporting the wounded Dalton to the battlefield
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's willingness to support local allies and fight for justice

goals: Help Chopper and the people of Drum Island
